mcgill.poker
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  mcgill.poker.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Player>
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Player>

The Player class represents the players in a game. Keeps track of each player contribution to the pot and their status.

compareTo

public int compareTo(Player player)
Compares if the player has more chips in the pot than another player. Returns -1 (player has lesser chips in the pot than the other player), 1 (player has more chips in pot than the other player), 0 (player has same amount of chips in the pot as the other player).

Specified by:
compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Player>

int
